minor_ward.name: Minor Ward
minor_ward.cast_message_self: You whisper a prayer of vigilance. Your senses sharpen.
minor_ward.cast_message_room: {caster}'s eyes flash with a vigilant light.

shield_of_faith.name: Shield of Faith
shield_of_faith.cast_message_self: A shimmering, translucent shield manifests around you.

deflection.name: Deflection
deflection.cast_message_self: The air around you hardens, deflecting incoming blows.
deflection.cast_message_room: The air around {caster} seems to harden and shimmer.

banish_vermin.name: Banish Vermin
banish_vermin.cast_message_target: You point at {target} and command it to BEGONE!
banish_vermin.cast_message_room: {caster} points a finger at {target}, shouting a word of banishment!

lesser_dispel.name: Lesser Dispel
lesser_dispel.cast_message_self: You feel a cleansing wave wash over you.
lesser_dispel.cast_message_room: {caster} shudders as a cleansing wave washes over them.

arcane_aegis.name: Arcane Aegis
arcane_aegis.cast_message_self: Plates of force interlock over your armor.
arcane_aegis.cast_message_room: Plates of translucent force appear over {caster}'s armor.

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.cast_message_self: A profound aura of peace surrounds you.
sanctuary.cast_message_room: A profound aura of peace surrounds {caster}.

resist_elements.name: Resist Elements
resist_elements.cast_message_self: You feel insulated against heat and cold.
resist_elements.cast_message_room: {caster} is surrounded by a faint, thermal haze.

watchful_eye.name: Watchful Eye
watchful_eye.cast_message_self: You feel a third eye open in your mind, watching for danger.

circle_of_protection.name: Circle of Protection
circle_of_protection.cast_message_self: You project a wide circle of protective energy around your group!
circle_of_protection.cast_message_room: {caster} projects a wide circle of protective energy!

stone_skin.name: Stone Skin
stone_skin.cast_message_self: Your skin turns grey and hard as granite.
stone_skin.cast_message_room: {caster}'s skin turns grey and hard as granite.

dismissal.name: Dismissal
dismissal.cast_message_target: You command the forces binding {target} to this plane to unravel!
dismissal.cast_message_room: {caster} commands the forces binding {target} to unravel!

spell_shield.name: Spell Shield
spell_shield.cast_message_self: Runes of negation orbit your body, ready to absorb magic.

death_ward.name: Death Ward
death_ward.cast_message_self: A somber grey aura protects your life force.

greater_dispel.name: Greater Dispel
greater_dispel.cast_message_target: You rip the magical auras from {target}!

aegis_of_the_gods.name: Aegis of the Gods
aegis_of_the_gods.cast_message_self: You are encased in blinding, impenetrable divine light!
aegis_of_the_gods.cast_message_room: {caster} is encased in blinding, impenetrable divine light!
